text:
#KnowCovid19 Fake News Alert:

Kindly disregard news circulating that the mRNA #vaccine for #COVID19 could cause irreversible genetic damage.

mRNA vaccines do not alter DNA!

See Justification below.

Pass the information for the benefit of others.

#hoaxnews #fake #staysafe https://t.co/UMdzGg4hJK
